pt.davidafsilva.jtrakt

Interface TraktTvService


  • public interface TraktTvService
    This interface details the contract for the Trakt TV service implementation.
    Author:
    David Silva

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Searches for TV shows that matches a given search criteria limiting the number of results that are returned, including a short seasons information if includeSeasons is set to true.

    • Method Detail

      • searchShow

        @GET(value="/search/shows.json/{apiKey}")
List<TvShow> searchShow(@Query(value="query")
                                                                  String show)

        Searches for TV shows that matches a given search criteria.

        Since no search limit is being applied, defaults to 30. Please use searchShow(String, int) in order to supply your own limit.
        Parameters:
        show - the search query that should be used.
        Returns:
        the search result with the matches for the search criteria
        See Also:
        searchShow(String, int), searchShow(String, int, boolean)

      • searchShow

        @GET(value="/search/shows.json/{apiKey}")
List<TvShow> searchShow(@Query(value="query")
                                                                  String show,
                                                                  @Query(value="limit")
                                                                  int limit)
        Searches for TV shows that matches a given search criteria limiting the number of results that are returned.
        Parameters:
        show - the search query that should be used.
        limit - the maximum number of results to be returned
        Returns:
        the search result with the matches for the search criteria
        See Also:
        searchShow(String), searchShow(String, int, boolean)

      • searchShow

        @GET(value="/search/shows.json/{apiKey}")
List<TvShow> searchShow(@Query(value="query")
                                                                  String show,
                                                                  @Query(value="limit")
                                                                  int limit,
                                                                  @Query(value="seasons")
                                                                  boolean includeSeasons)
        Searches for TV shows that matches a given search criteria limiting the number of results that are returned, including a short seasons information if includeSeasons is set to true.
        Parameters:
        show - the search query that should be used.
        limit - the maximum number of results to be returned
        includeSeasons - include a short season and episode information
        Returns:
        the search result with the matches for the search criteria
        See Also:
        searchShow(String), searchShow(String, int)

      • getGenres

        @GET(value="/genres/shows.json/{apiKey}")
List<Genre> getGenres()
        Gets all the possible genres for the TV shows
        Returns:
        all the possible genres

      • getShowSummary

        @GET(value="/show/summary.json/{apiKey}/{identifier}")
TvShowSummary getShowSummary(@Path(value="identifier")
                                                                                    String showIdentifier)
                                                                             throws NoResultsFoundException

        Returns detailed information about a specific TV show.

        The showIdentifier used in the query is either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        Parameters:
        showIdentifier - either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        Returns:
        the TV show summary
        Throws:
        NoResultsFoundException - if no results were found for the given showIdentifier
        See Also:
        getShowSummary(String, boolean)

      • getShowSummary

        @GET(value="/show/summary.json/{apiKey}/{identifier}/{extended}")
TvShowSummary getShowSummary(@Path(value="identifier")
                                                                                               String showIdentifier,
                                                                                               @Path(value="extended")
                                                                                               boolean extended)
                                                                                        throws NoResultsFoundException

        Returns detailed information about a specific TV show.

        The showIdentifier used in the query is either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        Parameters:
        showIdentifier - either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        extended - set this flag to true to returns a complete season and episode info. Only send this if you really need the full dump.
        Returns:
        the TV show summary
        Throws:
        NoResultsFoundException - if no results were found for the given showIdentifier
        See Also:
        getShowSummary(String)

      • getShowSeasons

        @GET(value="/show/seasons.json/{apiKey}/{identifier}")
List<TvShowSeason> getShowSeasons(@Path(value="identifier")
                                                                                         String showIdentifier)
                                                                                  throws NoResultsFoundException

        Returns some basic information about the seasons for a specific TV show.

        The showIdentifier used in the query is either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        Parameters:
        showIdentifier - either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        Returns:
        the basic seasons information
        Throws:
        NoResultsFoundException - if no results were found for the given showIdentifier

      • getShowEpisodes

        @GET(value="/show/season.json/{apiKey}/{identifier}/{season}")
List<TvShowSeasonEpisode> getShowEpisodes(@Path(value="identifier")
                                                                                                         String showIdentifier,
                                                                                                         @Path(value="season")
                                                                                                         int seasonNumber)
                                                                                                  throws NoResultsFoundException

        Returns detailed episode information for a specific season of a TV show.

        The showIdentifier used in the query is either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        Parameters:
        showIdentifier - either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        seasonNumber - the season number
        Returns:
        a list of detailed episodes information
        Throws:
        NoResultsFoundException - if no results were found for the given showIdentifier or the provided seasonNumber is invalid.

      • getShowEpisodeSummary

        @GET(value="/show/episode/summary.json/{apiKey}/{identifier}/{season}/{episode}")
TvShowEpisodeSummary getShowEpisodeSummary(@Path(value="identifier")
                                                                                                                             String showIdentifier,
                                                                                                                             @Path(value="season")
                                                                                                                             int seasonNumber,
                                                                                                                             @Path(value="episode")
                                                                                                                             int episodeNumber)
                                                                                                                      throws NoResultsFoundException

        Returns detailed information for a specific season-episode pair of a TV show.

        The showIdentifier used in the query is either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        Parameters:
        showIdentifier - either the slug (i.e. the-walking-dead) or TVDB identifier.
        seasonNumber - the season number
        episodeNumber - the episode number
        Returns:
        detailed information for the desired episode
        Throws:
        NoResultsFoundException - if no results were found for the given showIdentifier or either seasonNumber and/or episodeNumber are invalid.
